## R Markdown

```{r, results='asis', message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.show="hold", out.width="50%"}

df <- read.csv("sturgeon_WaterColumn_data.csv")
df1 <- df %>% 
  pivot_longer(names(df)[3:19]) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(value),
         name %in% c("DEPTH..SECCHI.DISK.DEPTH_SD_NA")) %>% 
  distinct()
df2 <- df %>% 
  pivot_longer(names(df)[3:19]) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(value),
         name %in% c("TRUE.COLOR_OW_TOTAL")) %>% 
  distinct()

plot(ggplot(df1,aes(x=name,y=value))+
       geom_boxplot()+
       theme(axis.text.x = NULL))
plot(ggplot(df2,aes(x=name,y=value))+
       geom_boxplot()+
       theme(axis.text.x = NULL))

```
